name: class
description: A class or category of entities

name: individual
description: A specific instance of a class

name: Resource
description: Goods, services, or money that have economic value.

name: Event
description: An economic event that changes the quantity of a resource.

name: Agent
description: A person or company who participates in an economic event.

name: LogicalOperator
description: A node representing a logical condition like AND or OR.

name: Substance
description: A material with definite chemical composition.

name: Element
description: A pure substance consisting of one type of atom.

name: Molecule
description: A group of atoms bonded together.

name: Transition
description: A process that transforms inputs to outputs.

name: Organization
description: A group of people organized for a purpose

name: Place
description: A physical location or geographical area

name: Concept
description: An abstract idea or mental construct
